title: First Week Onboarding
description: We spent the first week on the My Onboarding Journey, where we made a deep dive on Cisco's ins and outs, such as the company's culture, guidelines and general tools and platforms of which all employees depend on. Furthermore we participated in activities meant to learn Cisco's history and its technologies. Since this event happened in all EMEA, we had the opportunity to meet Cisco employees from all over the world.
